attributes.description: THE 3.8L V8 TWIN TURBO CHARGED ENGINE, IT HAS A 7 SPEED SEAMLESS SHIFT DUAL CLUTCH GEARBOX WITH A MAXIMUM SPEED OF 328 KM/H,CO2 EMISSIONS EU NEDC 249G/KM, DRY WEIGHT (Lightest) 1,313kg (2,895lbs), ECO START-STOP SYSTEM WITH DEACTIVATION SWITCH, LOW EXIT STAINLESS STEEL EXHAUST SYSTEM, 3 X POWERTRAIN MODES (NORMAL, SPORT, TRACK) TWIN MULTI-PLATE CLUTCHES, OPEN DIFFERENTIAL, LAUNCH CONTROL, DYNAMIC ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL(DESC), ANTI-LOCK BRAKING SYSTEM, TRACTION CONTROL, HILL HOLD ASSIST, CRUISE CONTROL, ELECTRONIC PARKING BRAKE, ADAPTING DAMPING S TUNE, MCLAREN BRAKE STEER, A VERY LIGHT SINGLE PIECE CARBON FIBRE MONOCELL || BODY STRUCTURE, WITH EXPOSED ENGINE BAY, SPORT 10-SPOKE CAST ALLOY WHEELS, TYRE PRESSURE MONITORING SYSTEM (TPMS) + TYRE PRESSURE GAUGE, CARBON CERAMIC BRAKES WITH 6-PISTON CALIPERS FRONT & 4-PISTON CALIPERS REAR, HIGH CABIN VISIBILITY, STRIKING DIHERAL DOORS. UNMISTAKEABLY MCLAREN AERODYNAMIC, FULL LED HEADLIGHTS WITH AUTOMATIC HEADLIGHT LEVELING, DUAL FUNCTION LED REAR FOG / REVERSE LIGHT, ELECTRICALLY FOLDING HEATED DOOR MIRRORS( WITH DIP IN REVERSE FUNCTIONALITY),DARK PALLADIUM REAR SPOILER, DARK PALLADIUM FRONT SPLITTER, BODY COLOR DOOR CASING, INTERIOR( Extended leather interior with textile headlining)...Service & delivery R4 999

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering, Haval Jolion. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Jolion is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Jolion features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine producing 105kw @ 210Nm and a measured 7,5L/100km giving you the best of both worlds.
Highly spec features include:
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Adjustable steering
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Cruise Control
-	17 Inch Alloy Wheels
-	Roof Rails
-	Leather Steering Wheel
-	Paddle Shift
-	3.5-inch colour instrument cluster (LCD)
-	Front 12V power outlet
-	Dashcam Power outlet
-	Fabric seats
-	Driver seat Manual adjust: 6 directions
-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	Dual and front Side airbags
-	Child lock
-	ABS + EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution) + BA (Brake Assist)
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)
-	Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
-	Hill Assist
-	Downhill Assist
-	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS)
-	Rear park distance sensors
-	Reverse camera with Guidelines
-	Driving fatigue detection
-	Keyless entry and Push button start
-	Bluetooth Handsfree and Front, rear dual USB connector
-	10.25-inch multimedia touch display
-	4-speaker system
-	Speed Sensitive Volume Control
-	Automatic headlights
-	Electric height-adjusting headlights and follow me home function
-	Daytime running lamps
-	Dual Zone Auto Aircon with Rear aircon duct
-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan
attributes.title: 2022 Haval Jolion 1.5T Premium Auto

attributes.description:
If you're looking for a small vehicle that offers big space, then this 2010 Honda Jazz should be near the top of your shortlist. The vehicle impresses thanks to a long list of standard equipment and a family-friendly interior. It comes with power steering, air conditioning, electric windows, trip computer, central locking remote control, radio/CD/AUX input and excellent legroom for both driver and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as licence, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle was R109 995 now R99 995 + VAT.
attributes.title: 2010 Honda Jazz 1.4i LX Auto

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering GWM P-Series Passenger Double Cab. The GWM P-Series Passenger Double Cab is a brand-new addition to the range of strong, reliable and "workaholic" GWM bakkies that are built for true adaptability. It features a responsive ZF 8AT speed gearbox, multi-link rear suspension and is powered by a 2.0 litre diesel engine with a mighty 120kW and 400n.m of torque.
Highly spec features include:
-	6 airbags, up/downhill assist control and vehicle stability control
-	9" touchscreen that comes standard with voice control, Carplay and wireless charging
-	Smart keyless entry and push start button
-	Dashcam
-	220V power outlet
-	LED taillight and daytime running headlamps
-	TOD (Torque on Demand) and Rear Diff lock
-	Steering Sensitivity Adjustable
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Dynamic Steering Torque
-	Adaptive Cruise Control
-	Lane departure warning + Lane keeping + Lane centre keeping
-	Forward Collision Warning & Auto Emergency Braking
-	Traffic Sign Recognition
-	Voice Recognition
-	Wireless Power Charger
-	Bluetooth
-	Heated leather Seats
-	Abs+Electronic Brake Distribution
-	Traction control+ Roll over mitigation + Brake Assist System
-	Hill Assist and Descent Control
-	Rear Cross Traffic Alert
-	360 Degree Camera
-	Tyre Pressure Monitor System
-	Diamond Cut Mags
-	Two-Tone Colour Arches 
-	Lockable Sport Lid
-	5year/100 000Km manufacturer’s warranty and service plan
attributes.title: 2022 GWM P-Series PV 2.0 TD LT 4x4 Auto Double-Cab
